actions.name: AssociateExternalConnection
actions.description: Grants permission to add an external connection to a repository

actions.name: AssociateWithDownstreamRepository
actions.description: Grants permission to associate an existing repository as an upstream repository to another repository

actions.name: CopyPackageVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to copy package versions from one repository to another repository in the same domain

actions.name: CreateDomain
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new domain

actions.name: CreateRepository
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new repository

actions.name: DeleteDomain
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a domain

actions.name: DeleteDomainPermissionsPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the resource policy set on a domain

actions.name: DeletePackageVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to delete package versions

actions.name: DeleteRepository
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a repository

actions.name: DeleteRepositoryPermissionsPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the resource policy set on a repository

actions.name: DescribeDomain
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about a domain

actions.name: DescribePackage
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a package

actions.name: DescribePackageVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about a package version

actions.name: DescribeRepository
actions.description: Grants permission to return detailed information about a repository

actions.name: DisassociateExternalConnection
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate an external connection from a repository

actions.name: DisposePackageVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to set the status of package versions to Disposed and delete their assets

actions.name: GetAuthorizationToken
actions.description: Grants permission to generate a temporary authentication token for accessing repositories in a domain

actions.name: GetDomainPermissionsPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to return a domain's resource policy

actions.name: GetPackageVersionAsset
actions.description: Grants permission to return an asset (or file) that is part of a package version

actions.name: GetPackageVersionReadme
actions.description: Grants permission to return a package version's readme file

actions.name: GetRepositoryEndpoint
actions.description: Grants permission to return an endpoint for a repository

actions.name: GetRepositoryPermissionsPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to return a repository's resource policy

actions.name: ListDomains
actions.description: Grants permission to list the domains in the current user's AWS account

actions.name: ListPackageVersionAssets
actions.description: Grants permission to list a package version's assets

actions.name: ListPackageVersionDependencies
actions.description: Grants permission to list the direct dependencies of a package version

actions.name: ListPackageVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to list a package's versions

actions.name: ListPackages
actions.description: Grants permission to list the packages in a repository

actions.name: ListRepositories
actions.description: Grants permission to list the repositories administered by the calling account

actions.name: ListRepositoriesInDomain
actions.description: Grants permission to list the repositories in a domain

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list tags for a CodeArtifact resource

actions.name: PublishPackageVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to publish assets and metadata to a repository endpoint

actions.name: PutDomainPermissionsPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to attach a resource policy to a domain

actions.name: PutPackageMetadata
actions.description: Grants permission to add, modify or remove package metadata using a repository endpoint

actions.name: PutPackageOriginConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to set origin configuration for a package

actions.name: PutRepositoryPermissionsPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to attach a resource policy to a repository

actions.name: ReadFromRepository
actions.description: Grants permission to return package assets and metadata from a repository endpoint

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to tag a CodeArtifact resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove a tag from a CodeArtifact resource

actions.name: UpdatePackageVersionsStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to modify the status of one or more versions of a package

actions.name: UpdateRepository
actions.description: Grants permission to modify the properties of a repository
